SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class MainController

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.MainController
All Implemented Interfaces:
VirtualMainController, Runnable, Remote
public class MainController extends Thread implements VirtualMainController
Allows to manage multiple games. It's a singleton that resides on the Server. Receive messages from clients that wants to join or creates game. Those messages are put in a BlockingQueue and are processed asynchronously.

  • Nested Class Summary

    • removeGame

      Removes a specified game from the Game list
      Parameters:

    • getGameController

      public GameController getGameController(String gameId) throws NullPointerException
      Return the GameController object for a given game.
      Parameters:
      gameId - the gameID of the game whose GameController is needed.
      Returns:
      a reference to the GameController that handles the specified game, null if there's no game with the provided GameID.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException

    • getPlayersGameController

      public GameController getPlayersGameController(String playerIdentifier)
      Retrieves the GameController that handles the game that the player (whose identifier is provided) is playing.
      Parameters:
      playerIdentifier - the identifier of the player whose GameController is needed.
      Returns:
      a reference to the GameController that handles the player's game, null if the player wasn't recognised.

    • getPlayersClientHandler

      public ClientHandler getPlayersClientHandler(String playerIdentifier)
      Retrieves the ClientHandler that handles the client of the player whose identifier is provided.
      Parameters:
      playerIdentifier - the identifier of the player whose ClientHandler is needed
      Returns:
      a reference to the ClientHandler that handles the client of the player, null if the player wasn't recognised.

    • getPlayer

      public Player getPlayer(String playerIdentifier)
      Retrieves the Player object that represents the player whose playerIdentifier is provided.
      Parameters:
      playerIdentifier - the identifier of the player whose object is needed.
      Returns:
      a reference to the Player with the specified playerIdentifier, null if the player wasn't recognised.

    • ping

      public void ping(String playerIdentifier, boolean isAnswer)
      Allows the client to send a ping message to the server.
      Specified by:
      ping in interface VirtualMainController
      Parameters:
      playerIdentifier - the identifier of the player who sending the ping message.
      isAnswer - true if the server is answering to a previous ping message, false if the server is checking on the client.

    • createGame

      public void createGame(String playerIdentifier, int expectedPlayers, String nick) throws RemoteException
      Allows a player to create a new game.
      Specified by:
      createGame in interface VirtualMainController
      Parameters:
      playerIdentifier - the identifier of the client that is creating a game
      expectedPlayers - The number of players the game is expected to handle
      nick - The nickname of the player creating the game
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an error occurs while setting up the remote object that wraps the GameController

    • connectClient

      public void connectClient(ClientHandler clientHandler)
      Complete a client's connection to the server. Generates, stores and sends (to the client) the player identifier.
      Parameters:
      clientHandler - the client handler of the client whose connection needs to be completed
